document_name: Commission Decision of 12 March 2009 establishing the revised ecological criteria for the award of the Community Eco-label to televisions
document_description: The Commission Decision 2009/300/EC establishes the revised ecological criteria for the award of the Community Eco-label to televisions. In line with Regulation (EC) No 66/2010 on Eco-Labelling, one of the key criterion to gain the label is energy efficiency. The document specifies that the manufacturer shall display the information that energy efficiency cuts energy consumption and thus saves money by reducing electricity bills. Commission Decision 2018/59 tightens the maximum energy consumption and specifications of the Energy Efficiency Index set out in Decision 2009/300/EC.
